description: Your seaside refuge. Where the roar of the ocean is your only morning alarm.
quote: The only king of the jungle here is you (in the hammock).
sidebar_text1: A coastal refuge where the only allowed hunting is for sunsets and cold coconuts.
sidebar_text2: Playa Bandera, Parrita. 10 minutes from the monkeys. 25 minutes from the sea. 0 minutes from stress.
